name: @rewind-media/rewind-api-spec
description: OpenAPI Specification for the public api of the Rewind-Media project

scripts.update: npm update --save && ((! git diff --exit-code package.json > /dev/null && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Dependency updates') || true)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run bundle && npm run validate
